thread.section_title: Tomtop 收到的点评内容 | 消费者对于 Tomtop 的点评意见 | www.tomtop.com
thread.title: John

author: John
title: John
text: I made 1 order with Tomtop in February 10 which have not arrived yet in Greece even though it says dispatched on February 11. I tried to track my package and I found out that since 2-25 it have been in Germany!!! Customer service keeps ignoring my 4-5 e-mails. Overall I think that this company is an utterly fraud that stole my money. The fun part of it is that they keep sending me new product notifications..
